snippet: The baritone, accompanied by the pianist Alexander Schmalcz, explored the psychology of human displacement.
abstract: Corinna da Fonseca-Wollheim reviews performance by German baritone Matthias Goerne with pianist Alexander Schmalcz at Alice Tully Hall.
lead_paragraph: The baritone, accompanied by the pianist Alexander Schmalcz, explored the psychology of human displacement.

headline.main: Review: Songs of Exile With Matthias Goerne
headline.print_headline: Songs of Exile and Guilt When Flight Is No Haven
